Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Your bullets puncture the frail joints of the Corrupted accurately. You are not trying to take them down but slow their advance.'}
{3: 'You have intentionally led the Corrupted into one place, taking advantage of their predatory instincts. Their slowed movement means there is enough time for you to get to safety.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'An ion beam arrives from afar, hitting the Corrupted group in the center and decimating them in a wave of blue flame.'}
{3: 'You load a new magazine into your pistol, chambering a round and cocking the gun.'}
{3: 'The pistol slide springs back with a sharp click, ready to fire the next bullet.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'This is your last magazine against an endless wave of Corrupted that is still charging toward you. Your wound is bleeding again, weighing down the bandages.'}
{2: 'We still have to hold on a little bit longer...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'You open fire while trying to come up with a plan.'}
{3: 'Skills and tactics are negligible at this point, considering the difference in numbers and armament.'}
{2: "There isn't another way...", 3: '32'}
{3: 'Although you are fighting side by side with Constructs, commandants often require their protection in battles.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "With a sharp ping from the gun's hammer, you fire your last bullet."}
{2: '(Take out combat knife)', 3: '38'}
{3: "You realize how powerless you really are at this moment. As Constructs become more and more powerful, a human's frailty becomes the weak link of the team."}
{3: 'You can hear Lee and Liv responding to your call for help in your comms. You must hold on for a little longer.'}
{3: "The rotting vocal modules of the Corrupted make an unintelligible sound like a beast's growl before its hunt."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg'}
{3: 'After landing on a snow mountain near Fort Winter, Alpha has been haunted by an unshakable feeling of being watched.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Is it the noise again...? No. This is a little different.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unable to gauge what it is, Alpha continues onward, trudging through snow and parting the trees until her vision clears up.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory698.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You can see the tower even from here?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Standing in an empty field, Alpha can see the blue spiral tower behind layers of mountains.'}
{3: 'A breeze lifts the hair that covers her left eye, and the image of the spiral tower is branded into her greyed iris.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory663.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory698.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Her damaged vision module is suddenly filled with a horrifying red. The intense sensation makes Alpha drop to her knees.'}
{3: 'Suppress<//ELIMINATE>... Accept<//DOMINATE>... Transform<//FILTER>...'}
{3: 'The noise in her audio module is slowly replaced by the overlapping chant. The vital fluid dripping from her left eye is leaving black scorch marks on the ground.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Corrupted?'}
{3: 'Alpha has no idea when the Corrupted surrounded her. She does not even bother to check if they are real or not.'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Devour... Dominate...', 4: '2', 5: '3'}
{3: 'They are like vultures hovering above, hoping to share the dying lion.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The Punishing Virus gathers around Alpha, burning her painfully.'}
{3: 'The Punishing Virus converted by the Inver-Hetero Tower never truly disappeared. Instead, they use this opportunity to locate the Ascendants, providing them with the nutrients to evolve, or...'}
{3: 'Devouring them whole.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The vital fluid leaking from her eye slowly becomes a blackish tar. Flickering, murky blocks of colors cover her whole body like a malfunctioning monitor.'}
{3: 'The corrosion is burning her whole body. An anger that does not belong to her fills her M.I.N.D.'}
{3: 'Her clothes, her blade, and even her frame are being deconstructed and reconstructed.'}
{3: 'Like the River Styx that Achilles bathed in, the highly concentrated Punishing Virus envelopes Alpha completely, transforming her frame while corrupting her spirit.'}
{3: 'This time, there is no Thetis to pull her back.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Seeing its motionless prey, one of the carrion-eating vultures can no longer suppress its hunger and leap toward its target.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'But a mud-coated hand snatches its head instead, crushing it into a ball in an instant.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The figure covered in dirt stands up, tossing away the corpse in her hand.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Facing a tidal wave of Corrupted, the person who has fallen into the abyss sneers.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory204.png'}
{3: 'Two figures are sitting opposite each other inside an old underground casino.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3401_12.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3401_12.jpg'}
{3: 'The smiling woman gently places her finger on a stack of spread cards.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Do you want me to hit it, Vonnegut?'}
{3: 'The man opposite her nods.'}
{3: 'This was a private underground casino during the Golden Age. The spacious venue and the million-dollar poker chips speak to its glorious past.'}

{3: 'Nowadays, it is a ruin with debris piling on the floor. Poker chips that were once valuable scatter everywhere, while decorated machines are smashed into pieces. It took Lilith quite a while to find two intact chairs.'}
{3: 'The man in a mask stares at the cards on the table without flipping them over, seemingly not caring if his hand is good or bad.'}
{3: 'Lilith pushes a card to her opponent before taking one herself.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Are you sure you don't want to take a look at your hand, Vonnegut?"}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'The unknown is part of the joy of a gamble.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Are you planning to leave everything to luck, or...'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Luck is just a part of it.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Is that what you've been meaning to ask?"}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: '...I can never hide anything from you.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'I don\'t get it. Babylonia\'s Purifying Force is getting close to the truth, and we let the Forsaken discover the list of names "just in time."'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "They're going to find out the exact location of Fort Winter."}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Are you sure it's a good idea to let them take the research institute? Isn't Kurono still working with us?"}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Information is only useful if it is delivered to where it should be.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'The information in Fort Winter is meaningless to me now. This is the best time to play this card.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Why does it have to be now?'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Morality only concerns humans after basic survival is guaranteed.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'A new world needs to bury these people in the graves of the past.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Humans get their justice, and I get what I want. This is a win-win situation that benefits everyone.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Stopping them from their victory will only incite a fiercer resistance. This isn't a zero-sum game. We just need to win more every time."}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "That's why I won't hold you responsible for leading Alpha to the Kurono forces that were after Lucia."}
{3: "Lilith's grip tightens reflexively, slightly bending the cards."}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "I didn't know. I just wanted her to owe me one."}
{3: 'Silence brews in the dark room. Lilith sits straight without realizing it, while the man on the other side still looks relaxed and calm.'}
{3: 'Right then, a small figure appears at the door.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory204.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Lilith, it is ready.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Thank you so much, Cinderelik. Do you want me to bring anything back?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'For example... news on Kugawa Kurono?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: "...That's not necessary. Mother is all I need.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Go. Confirm her status.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Whether she is devoured and becomes the Ascension-Network's sharpest blade or gives in and accepts the Ascension-Network's gift, it is our duty to know.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vonnegut pushes his unrevealed cards back to the stack.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'This is your final trial.', 4: '1'}
